rule.condition: same(title in $L.file, NULL) and not (same(description in $L.file, NULL))
rule.conditionDesc: ( Title in CurrentRecord = NULL AND Description in CurrentRecord != NULL)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Title">title</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Description">description</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Set the Title (when ( Title in CurrentRecord = NULL AND Description in CurrentRecord != NULL))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"setField","fieldName":"title","script":"var descLen = record[\"description\"].length();\u000d\u000afor (var i=0; i<descLen; i++) {\u000d\u000a if (record[\"description\"][i] !== null && record[\"description\"][i] !== \"\") {\u000d\u000a value = record[\"description\"][i].substr(0,100);\u000d\u000a break;\u000d\u000a }\u000d\u000a}"}
